code: export var ADD_USER='ADD_USER';export var RECEIVE_USER='RECEIVE_USER';export function receiveUsers(users){return{type:RECEIVE_USER,users:users};}function addUser(name,username,password,avatarURL){return{type:ADD_USER,name:name,username:username,password:password,avatarURL:avatarURL};}export function handleAddUser(name,username,password,avatarURL){return function(dispatch){dispatch(addUser(name,username,password,avatarURL));};}
